name: Dragon Knight Royal Quest RPG
description:
"Dragon Knight Royal Quest RPG" is an indie game that has everything a lover of RPG games expects from them.
A story based on a medieval and fantastic era, with dragons, kings and magic.

At the beginning of the game you will see how the hero you incarnate in this adventure is summoned by the king, who will talk about a villain and a mission. This will be seen in the great introductory sequence just start the game and will introduce you deeper into what will be the plot of this game.(the screenshots you see of the game correspond only to this introductory scene, because we do not want to reveal anything else)

What to expect:

-Retro graphics and epic ambientation

-Good music and sound effects

-Adventure and good story.

How to play:

-You just need arrow keys and space to move and interactuate.
